QuestData.Title: Blood of the Burning Blade
QuestData.Description: Hallvalor is the ancestral home of my clan, the Burning Blade. When the new warlord and his family came to power, I was exiled for being a half-breed.$B$BI want justice.$B$BI suspect you won't mind killing along the way. Not that you'll have any choice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Burning Blade forces at Hallvalor.

Objectives.Objective: Burning Blade forces at Hallvalor slain
